Name: Starlight Resort Hotel
Description: Located on the Mediterranean coast in the Kizilagac region, this large holiday complex is approximately 11 km from Manavgat and around 12 km from the popular resort and historical city of Side. A wide range of leisure, sport and convention facilities are offered in this family friendly hotel and guests can also benefit from the comprehensive Thalasso and Spa Centre. The complex consists of 811 rooms situated in the main building and club rooms which are in 2-storey blocks in the grounds. There are a number of shops and a hairdressing salon within the complex. Further facilities include a games room, children's playground, kids' club, a choice of bars and restaurants, swimming pools and sports amenities.  Guests can also benefit from the sister hotel's activities nextdoor. (Some facilities may not be operational due to weather/seasonal conditions).

Facilities.Name: All inclusive with alcoholic drinks own brands
